titleStmt.title: Natural allegiance, and a national protection, truly stated, being a full answer to Dr. G. Burnett's vindication of himself
titleStmt.author: Northleigh, John, 1657-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,
